016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.resources;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Link;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.MediaTypes;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Links;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.ResourceDocument;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources.JsonApiResource;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapischema.ResourceDocumentSchema;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapischema.ResourceObjectSchema;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.JsonSchema;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.server.resources.JsonSchemaMixin;
027import jakarta.inject.Inject;
028import jakarta.inject.Provider;
029import jakarta.ws.rs.GET;
030import jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException;
031import jakarta.ws.rs.Path;
032import jakarta.ws.rs.Produces;
033
034import java.util.Optional;
035
036import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.describedby;
037import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.self;
038
039@Path("api/eventstore")
040public class EventStoreResource
041        extends JsonApiResource
042        implements JsonSchemaMixin {
043
044    @Inject
045    public EventStoreResource(Provider<EventStoreStreams> eventStoreService) {
046        Optional.ofNullable(eventStoreService.get()).orElseThrow(NotFoundException::new);
047    }
048
049    @GET
050    @Produces(MediaTypes.APPLICATION_JSON_SCHEMA)
051    public JsonSchema schema() {
052        return new ResourceDocumentSchema.Builder()
053                .resources(streamSchema())
054                .builder()
055                .links(new com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Links.Builder()
056                        .link(selfLink()).link(describedbyLink(getAbsolutePath().toASCIIString()))
057                        .with(websocket("events", EventStoreParameters.class),
058                                l -> l.link(new Link.UriTemplateBuilder("stream")
059                                        .parameter("id", "Stream id", "Stream id")
060                                        .build()))
061                        .build())
062                .builder()
063                .title("EventStore")
064                .build();
065    }
066
067    @GET
068    public ResourceDocument get() {
069        return new ResourceDocument.Builder()
070                .links(new Links.Builder()
071                        .link(self, getUriInfo().getRequestUri().toASCIIString())
072                        .link(describedby, getAbsolutePathBuilder().path(".schema").toTemplate())
073                        .link("stream", getUriBuilderFor(StreamResource.class).toTemplate())
074                        .link("events", getBaseUriBuilder()
075                                .scheme(getBaseUri().getScheme().equals("https") ? "wss" : "ws")
076                                .path("ws/events")
077                                .toTemplate())
078                        .build())
079                .build();
080    }
081
082    private ResourceObjectSchema streamSchema() {
083        return new ResourceObjectSchema.Builder()
084                .type(ApiTypes.stream)
085                .attributes(attributes(EventStoreModel.Stream.values()))
086                .with(b -> b.builder().builder().title("Stream"))
087                .build();
088    }
089
090}
